title: AI-Driven Question Generation and Grading System
description: Led development of an AI-based system that generates questions and grades user responses using internally developed NLP ML classification models, achieving an accuracy of over 95.4%.

title: CRUD REST API Development
description: Designed REST API endpoints for operations on a MySQL-backed database, optimizing for security and error handling.

title: User Tier Management Automation
description: Implemented a daily automated script to upgrade/downgrade user tiers based on monthly anniversaries using internal APIs. Ensured proper data logging and handling of edge cases.

title: Scalable Loan Risk Pricing and Prediction System
description: Developed an ML model for loan risk pricing, training on a 500,000-row dataset, optimizing for low latency and large-scale financial computations.

title: Recipe Calorie Predictor
description: Trained a Random Forest Regressor to predict recipe calories with 92% accuracy using features like average rating and proportion of protein and sugar levels.

title: Automated Football Statistics Website
description: Designed a full stack football statistics dashboard using React, Flask, and AWS, with a dynamic data pipeline fetching API data and storing it in an S3 bucket.

title: AI-Based Email Summarizer Chrome Extension
description: Developed a Chrome Extension integrating GMAIL & OpenAI APIs to fetch recent emails and generate automated summaries sent directly to users' inboxes.

title: Autonomous Vehicle Simulator
description: Designed a vehicle dynamics simulator to model autonomous vehicle behavior on custom-designed tracks using C++ and SDL2 for real-time rendering.

title: DSC 106 Project: Expository Visualization
description: Designed an expository visualization to effectively communicate insights from a dataset on climate in major U.S. cities, providing a rigorous rationale for design choices and data transformations.
